column.name: S_EJBQL
column.value: SELECT o FROM TbrCad3016Emplr o WHERE (:numFedTax is null OR o.numFedTax != :numFedTax) AND (:dscEmployer is null OR o.dscEmployer != :dscEmployer)

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: Catalogo de Empregador vinculado ao cargo.

column.name: S_EJBQL
column.value: SELECT o FROM TbrCadCompany o WHERE (:numFedTax is null OR o.numFedTax != :numFedTax) AND (:dscCompany is null OR o.dscCompany != :dscCompany)

column.name: S_DESCRIPTION
column.value: Catalogo de Empresas vinculadas ao cargo
